docs.title: 欢迎使用 YayuWiki
docs.text: 欢迎来到企业产品知识库！这里汇集了我们所有产品的技术文档、API 参考和最佳实践。

docs.text: 本文档支持中英文双语，您可以通过右上角的语言切换器选择您偏好的语言。

docs.text:
• 代码高亮 - 支持多种编程语言的语法高亮
  • 搜索功能 - 快速搜索文档内容
  • 深色模式 - 护眼的深色主题
  • 响应式设计 - 完美支持移动设备

docs.title: API 参考文档
docs.text: 本文档提供完整的 REST API 接口说明。

docs.title: 接口地址
docs.text:
生产环境: https://api.yourcompany.com/v1
测试环境: https://api-test.yourcompany.com/v1

docs.title: 认证方式
docs.text:
所有 API 请求需要在请求头中包含认证令牌：

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN

docs.title: 响应格式
docs.text:
所有响应均为 JSON 格式：

{
  "code": 200,
  "message": "success",
  "data": {},
  "timestamp": 1234567890
}

docs.title: 获取用户列表
docs.text:
获取所有用户信息。

请求

GET /api/users

查询参数

参数 类型 必填 说明 page integer 否 页码，默认 1 size integer 否 每页数量，默认 20 keyword string 否 搜索关键词

响应示例

{
  "code": 200,
  "message": "success",
  "data": {
    "total": 100,
    "page": 1,
    "size": 20,
    "items": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "username": "john_doe",
        "email": "john@example.com",
        "created_at": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
      }
    ]
  }
}

代码示例

PythonJavaScriptcURL 
import requests

url = "https://api.yourcompany.com/v1/api/users"
headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"
}
params = {
    "page": 1,
    "size": 20
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, params=params)
data = response.json()
print(data)

const url = 'https://api.yourcompany.com/v1/api/users';
const headers = {
    'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'
};

fetch(url + '?page=1&size=20', { headers })
    .then(response => response.json())
    .then(data => console.log(data));

curl -X GET "https://api.yourcompany.com/v1/api/users?page=1&size=20" \
     -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"

docs.title: 创建用户
docs.text:
创建新用户。

请求

POST /api/users

请求体

{
  "username": "john_doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "password": "secure_password",
  "role": "user"
}

响应示例

{
  "code": 201,
  "message": "User created successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "username": "john_doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "role": "user",
    "created_at": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
  }
}

docs.title: 获取用户详情
docs.text:
获取指定用户的详细信息。

请求

GET /api/users/{user_id}

路径参数

参数 类型 说明 user_id integer 用户 ID

响应示例

{
  "code": 200,
  "message": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "username": "john_doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "role": "user",
    "profile": {
      "avatar": "https://example.com/avatar.jpg",
      "bio": "Software Developer"
    },
    "created_at": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "updated_at": "2025-01-02T00:00:00Z"
  }
}

docs.title: 更新用户
docs.text:
更新用户信息。

请求

PUT /api/users/{user_id}

请求体

{
  "email": "newemail@example.com",
  "profile": {
    "bio": "Senior Software Developer"
  }
}

docs.title: 删除用户
docs.text:
删除指定用户。

请求

DELETE /api/users/{user_id}

响应示例

{
  "code": 200,
  "message": "User deleted successfully"
}

docs.title: 获取数据列表
docs.text:
请求

GET /api/data

查询参数

参数 类型 必填 说明 category string 否 数据分类 start_date string 否 开始日期 (YYYY-MM-DD) end_date string 否 结束日期 (YYYY-MM-DD)

代码示例

import requests
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

# 获取最近7天的数据
end_date = datetime.now()
start_date = end_date - timedelta(days=7)

params = {
    "category": "sales",
    "start_date": start_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
    "end_date": end_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
}

response = requests.get(
    "https://api.yourcompany.com/v1/api/data",
    headers={"Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"},
    params=params
)

data = response.json()

docs.title: 创建数据记录
docs.text:
请求

POST /api/data

请求体

{
  "category": "sales",
  "value": 1000.50,
  "metadata": {
    "region": "Asia",
    "product": "Product A"
  },
  "timestamp": "2025-01-01T12:00:00Z"
}

docs.title: 实时数据订阅
docs.text:
连接到 WebSocket 服务器以接收实时数据更新。

连接地址

wss://api.yourcompany.com/ws

连接示例

const ws = new WebSocket('wss://api.yourcompany.com/ws');

// 连接建立
ws.onopen = () => {
    console.log('Connected to WebSocket');

    // 订阅特定频道
    ws.send(JSON.stringify({
        action: 'subscribe',
        channel: 'data_updates',
        token: 'YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'
    }));
};

// 接收消息
ws.onmessage = (event) => {
    const data = JSON.parse(event.data);
    console.log('Received:', data);
};

// 连接关闭
ws.onclose = () => {
    console.log('Disconnected from WebSocket');
};

docs.title: 错误代码
速率限制
docs.text:
API 请求受到以下速率限制：

  • 标准用户: 100 请求/分钟
  • 高级用户: 1000 请求/分钟
  • 企业用户: 10000 请求/分钟

超过限制将返回 429 Too Many Requests 错误。

Testing: https://api-test.yourcompany.com/v1

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
All API requests must include an authentication token in the request header:

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN

docs.title: Response Format
docs.text:
All responses are in JSON format:

{
  "code": 200,
  "message": "success",
  "data": {},
  "timestamp": 1234567890
}

docs.title: Get User List
docs.text:
Retrieve all user information.

Request

GET /api/users

Query Parameters

Parameter Type Required Description page integer No Page number, default 1 size integer No Items per page, default 20 keyword string No Search keyword

Response Example

{
  "code": 200,
  "message": "success",
  "data": {
    "total": 100,
    "page": 1,
    "size": 20,
    "items": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "username": "john_doe",
        "email": "john@example.com",
        "created_at": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
      }
    ]
  }
}

Code Examples

PythonJavaScriptcURL 
import requests

url = "https://api.yourcompany.com/v1/api/users"
headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"
}
params = {
    "page": 1,
    "size": 20
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, params=params)
data = response.json()
print(data)

const url = 'https://api.yourcompany.com/v1/api/users';
const headers = {
    'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'
};

fetch(url + '?page=1&size=20', { headers })
    .then(response => response.json())
    .then(data => console.log(data));

curl -X GET "https://api.yourcompany.com/v1/api/users?page=1&size=20" \
     -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"

docs.title: Get Data List
docs.text:
Request

GET /api/data

Query Parameters

Parameter Type Required Description category string No Data category start_date string No Start date (YYYY-MM-DD) end_date string No End date (YYYY-MM-DD)

Code Example

import requests
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

# Get data from the last 7 days
end_date = datetime.now()
start_date = end_date - timedelta(days=7)

params = {
    "category": "sales",
    "start_date": start_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
    "end_date": end_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
}

response = requests.get(
    "https://api.yourcompany.com/v1/api/data",
    headers={"Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"},
    params=params
)

data = response.json()

docs.title: Real-time Data Subscription
docs.text:
Connect to the WebSocket server to receive real-time data updates.

Connection URL

wss://api.yourcompany.com/ws

Connection Example

const ws = new WebSocket('wss://api.yourcompany.com/ws');

// Connection established
ws.onopen = () => {
    console.log('Connected to WebSocket');

    // Subscribe to specific channel
    ws.send(JSON.stringify({
        action: 'subscribe',
        channel: 'data_updates',
        token: 'YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'
    }));
};

// Receive messages
ws.onmessage = (event) => {
    const data = JSON.parse(event.data);
    console.log('Received:', data);
};

// Connection closed
ws.onclose = () => {
    console.log('Disconnected from WebSocket');
};

docs.title: Error Codes
Rate Limiting
docs.text:
API requests are subject to the following rate limits:

  • Standard Users: 100 requests/minute
  • Premium Users: 1000 requests/minute
  • Enterprise Users: 10000 requests/minute

Exceeding the limit will return a 429 Too Many Requests error.

We provide SDKs in multiple languages:

  • Python SDK
  • JavaScript SDK

  • Go SDK

docs.text:
• Getting Started

docs.title: Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide will help you quickly install and configure the product.

docs.title: System Requirements
docs.text:
Before you begin, ensure your system meets the following requirements:

  • Operating System: Linux, macOS, Windows
  • Python: 3.8 or higher
  • Memory: Minimum 2GB RAM
  • Disk Space: 500MB available space

docs.title: 1. Download Installation Package
docs.text:
Using pipInstall from SourceUsing Docker 
pip install yayu-product

git clone https://github.com/yourcompany/yayu-product.git
cd yayu-product
pip install -e .

docker pull yourcompany/yayu-product:latest
docker run -d -p 8080:8080 yourcompany/yayu-product:latest

docs.title: 2. Configure Environment
docs.text:
Create configuration file config.yaml:

# Basic Configuration
server:
  host: 0.0.0.0
  port: 8080

# Database Configuration
database:
  type: postgresql
  host: localhost
  port: 5432
  name: yayu_db

# Logging Configuration
logging:
  level: INFO
  file: /var/log/yayu/app.log

docs.title: 3. Initialize Database
docs.text:
yayu-cli db init
yayu-cli db migrate

docs.title: 4. Start Service
docs.text: yayu-cli start

docs.title: Verify Installation
docs.text:
Visit http://localhost:8080 to verify the service is running properly.

You should see the welcome page:

{
  "status": "success",
  "message": "YaYu Product is running",
  "version": "1.0.0"
}

docs.title: Common Issues
docs.text:
What if the port is already in use?

You can modify the port number in the configuration file, or specify a port using the following command: 

yayu-cli start --port 8888

Database connection failed?

Please check: - Is the database service running - Is the connection information in the configuration file correct - Network firewall settings

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: YayuWiki is an enterprise-grade product documentation center that provides comprehensive technical documentation, API references, and best practice guides for users.

docs.title: 1. Comprehensive Documentation Coverage
docs.text:
• Product Documentation - Detailed product feature descriptions and user guides
  • API Documentation - Complete API interface documentation with code examples
  • Best Practices - Validated solutions and usage tips

docs.title: 2. Multi-language Support
docs.text: Our documentation supports both Chinese and English to meet the needs of different users.

docs.title: 3. Modern Reading Experience
docs.text:
• Dark/Light theme switching
  • Responsive design, perfectly adapted to all devices
  • Powerful search functionality
  • Code highlighting and copying

docs.title: Product Architecture
docs.text:
graph LR
    A[Users] --> B[Documentation Center]
    B --> C[Product Docs]
    B --> D[API Docs]
    B --> E[Tutorials]
    C --> F[Core Features]
    C --> G[Advanced Features]
    D --> H[REST API]
    D --> I[SDK]

docs.title: Target Audience
docs.text:
• Developers - Technical personnel who need to integrate our products
  • Product Managers - Understanding product features and planning
  • Technical Support - Support teams solving user issues
  • End Users - Enterprise users using the product

docs.title: Next Steps
docs.text: Continue reading the Installation Guide to learn how to quickly get started with our product.

docs.title: Features
docs.text: This page details the core features and capabilities of the product.

docs.title: Multiple Authentication Methods
docs.text:
• Username/Password Login - Traditional username and password authentication
  • OAuth 2.0 - Third-party login support (WeChat, DingTalk, etc.)
  • LDAP/AD - Enterprise directory service integration
  • SAML 2.0 - Enterprise Single Sign-On

docs.title: Permission Management
docs.text:
# Example: Role-Based Access Control
@require_permission("user:read")
def get_user_list():
    """Get user list"""
    return User.query.all()

@require_permission("user:write")
def create_user(user_data):
    """Create user"""
    user = User(**user_data)
    db.session.add(user)
    db.session.commit()
    return user

docs.title: Data Import
docs.text:
Support for multiple data import formats:

  • CSV
  • Excel (XLSX)
  • JSON
  • XML

docs.title: Data Export
docs.text:
// Example: Export data to Excel
async function exportToExcel(data, filename) {
    const workbook = new ExcelJS.Workbook();
    const worksheet = workbook.addWorksheet('Data');

    // Add headers
    worksheet.columns = [
        { header: 'ID', key: 'id', width: 10 },
        { header: 'Name', key: 'name', width: 32 },
        { header: 'Email', key: 'email', width: 32 }
    ];

    // Add data
    worksheet.addRows(data);

    // Save file
    const buffer = await workbook.xlsx.writeBuffer();
    saveAs(new Blob([buffer]), filename);
}

docs.title: WebSocket Support
docs.text:
# Server-side example
from fastapi import WebSocket

@app.websocket("/ws")
async def websocket_endpoint(websocket: WebSocket):
    await websocket.accept()
    while True:
        data = await websocket.receive_text()
        await websocket.send_text(f"Message received: {data}")

// Client-side example
const ws = new WebSocket('ws://localhost:8080/ws');

ws.onopen = () => {
    console.log('Connected to server');
    ws.send('Hello Server!');
};

ws.onmessage = (event) => {
    console.log('Received:', event.data);
};

docs.title: 4. Task Scheduling
docs.text:
Support for scheduled and asynchronous task processing:

from celery import Celery

app = Celery('tasks', broker='redis://localhost:6379')

@app.task
def process_data(data_id):
    """Asynchronous data processing"""
    data = fetch_data(data_id)
    result = analyze_data(data)
    save_result(result)
    return result

# Scheduled task
@app.task
def daily_report():
    """Daily report generation"""
    generate_report()

docs.title: Alert Rules
docs.text:
Alert Configuration Example

alerts:
  - name: high_cpu_usage
    condition: cpu_usage > 80%
    duration: 5m
    severity: warning
    notification:
      - email
      - slack

  - name: api_error_rate
    condition: error_rate > 5%
    duration: 3m
    severity: critical
    notification:
      - email
      - sms
      - pagerduty

docs.title: 1. Plugin System
docs.text:
Support for extending functionality through plugins:

class Plugin:
    """Base plugin class"""

    def __init__(self, config):
        self.config = config

    def on_load(self):
        """Called when plugin is loaded"""
        pass

    def on_request(self, request):
        """Called during request processing"""
        pass

    def on_response(self, response):
        """Called when response is returned"""
        pass

docs.title: 2. Workflow Engine
docs.text:
Visual workflow design and execution:

graph LR
    A[Start] --> B{Condition}
    B -->|Yes| C[Execute Task A]
    B -->|No| D[Execute Task B]
    C --> E[Aggregate Results]
    D --> E
    E --> F[End]

docs.title: 3. Data Analytics
docs.text:
Built-in powerful data analysis capabilities:

  • Statistical analysis
  • Trend forecasting
  • Anomaly detection
  • Correlation analysis

docs.title: Caching Strategy
docs.text:
from functools import lru_cache
from redis import Redis

redis_client = Redis(host='localhost', port=6379)

# Memory cache
@lru_cache(maxsize=1000)
def get_user_by_id(user_id):
    return User.query.get(user_id)

# Redis cache
def get_product(product_id):
    cache_key = f"product:{product_id}"
    cached = redis_client.get(cache_key)

    if cached:
        return json.loads(cached)

    product = Product.query.get(product_id)
    redis_client.setex(
        cache_key, 
        3600,  # 1 hour expiration
        json.dumps(product.to_dict())
    )
    return product.to_dict()

docs.title: Product Positioning
docs.text: YaYu Product is a comprehensive enterprise solution designed to help businesses improve efficiency, reduce costs, and optimize business processes.

docs.text:
Our product adopts a modern microservices architecture to ensure high availability and scalability:

graph TB
    A[Client] --> B[API Gateway]
    B --> C[Auth Service]
    B --> D[Business Service]

    D --> F[(Primary Database)]
    D --> G[(Cache)]

docs.title: 2. Data Processing Module

• Real-time data processing

docs.title: 安装指南
docs.text: 本指南将帮助您快速安装和配置产品。

docs.title: 系统要求
docs.text:
在开始之前，请确保您的系统满足以下要求：

  • 操作系统: Linux, macOS, Windows
  • Python: 3.8 或更高版本
  • 内存: 最低 2GB RAM
  • 磁盘空间: 500MB 可用空间

docs.title: 1. 下载安装包
docs.text:
使用 pip从源码安装使用 Docker 
pip install yayu-product

git clone https://github.com/yourcompany/yayu-product.git
cd yayu-product
pip install -e .

docker pull yourcompany/yayu-product:latest
docker run -d -p 8080:8080 yourcompany/yayu-product:latest

docs.title: 2. 配置环境
docs.text:
创建配置文件 config.yaml：

# 基础配置
server:
  host: 0.0.0.0
  port: 8080

# 数据库配置
database:
  type: postgresql
  host: localhost
  port: 5432
  name: yayu_db

# 日志配置
logging:
  level: INFO
  file: /var/log/yayu/app.log

docs.title: 3. 初始化数据库
docs.text:
yayu-cli db init
yayu-cli db migrate

docs.title: 4. 启动服务
docs.text: yayu-cli start

docs.title: 验证安装
docs.text:
访问 http://localhost:8080 验证服务是否正常运行。

您应该看到欢迎页面：

{
  "status": "success",
  "message": "YaYu Product is running",
  "version": "1.0.0"
}

docs.title: 常见问题
docs.text:
端口被占用怎么办？

您可以在配置文件中修改端口号，或使用以下命令指定端口： 

yayu-cli start --port 8888

数据库连接失败？

请检查： - 数据库服务是否运行 - 配置文件中的连接信息是否正确 - 网络防火墙设置

docs.title: 下一步
docs.text:
• 查看 产品概述 了解核心功能
  • 阅读 API 参考 开始集成开发

docs.title: 概述
docs.text: YayuWiki 是一个企业级产品文档中心，为用户提供全面的技术文档、API 参考和最佳实践指南。

docs.title: 1. 全面的文档覆盖
docs.text:
• 产品文档 - 详细的产品功能说明和使用指南
  • API 文档 - 完整的 API 接口文档和示例代码
  • 最佳实践 - 经过验证的解决方案和使用技巧

docs.title: 2. 多语言支持
docs.text: 我们的文档支持中英文双语，满足不同用户的需求。

docs.title: 3. 现代化的阅读体验
docs.text:
• 深色/浅色主题切换
  • 响应式设计，完美适配各种设备
  • 强大的搜索功能
  • 代码高亮和复制

docs.title: 产品架构
docs.text:
graph LR
    A[用户] --> B[文档中心]
    B --> C[产品文档]
    B --> D[API 文档]
    B --> E[教程指南]
    C --> F[核心功能]
    C --> G[高级特性]
    D --> H[REST API]
    D --> I[SDK]

docs.title: 目标用户
docs.text:

docs.title: 功能特性
docs.text: 本页面详细介绍产品的核心功能和特性。

docs.title: 多种认证方式
docs.text:
• 用户名密码登录 - 传统的用户名密码认证
  • OAuth 2.0 - 支持第三方登录（微信、钉钉等）
  • LDAP/AD - 企业目录服务集成
  • SAML 2.0 - 企业级单点登录

docs.title: 权限管理
docs.text:
# 示例：基于角色的权限控制
@require_permission("user:read")
def get_user_list():
    """获取用户列表"""
    return User.query.all()

@require_permission("user:write")
def create_user(user_data):
    """创建用户"""
    user = User(**user_data)
    db.session.add(user)
    db.session.commit()
    return user

docs.title: 数据导入
docs.text:
支持多种格式的数据导入：

  • CSV
  • Excel (XLSX)
  • JSON
  • XML

docs.title: 数据导出
docs.text:
// 示例：导出数据为 Excel
async function exportToExcel(data, filename) {
    const workbook = new ExcelJS.Workbook();
    const worksheet = workbook.addWorksheet('Data');

    // 添加表头
    worksheet.columns = [
        { header: 'ID', key: 'id', width: 10 },
        { header: 'Name', key: 'name', width: 32 },
        { header: 'Email', key: 'email', width: 32 }
    ];

    // 添加数据
    worksheet.addRows(data);

    // 保存文件
    const buffer = await workbook.xlsx.writeBuffer();
    saveAs(new Blob([buffer]), filename);
}

docs.title: WebSocket 支持
docs.text:
# 服务端示例
from fastapi import WebSocket

@app.websocket("/ws")
async def websocket_endpoint(websocket: WebSocket):
    await websocket.accept()
    while True:
        data = await websocket.receive_text()
        await websocket.send_text(f"Message received: {data}")

// 客户端示例
const ws = new WebSocket('ws://localhost:8080/ws');

ws.onopen = () => {
    console.log('Connected to server');
    ws.send('Hello Server!');
};

ws.onmessage = (event) => {
    console.log('Received:', event.data);
};

docs.title: 4. 任务调度
docs.text:
支持定时任务和异步任务处理：

from celery import Celery

app = Celery('tasks', broker='redis://localhost:6379')

@app.task
def process_data(data_id):
    """异步处理数据"""
    data = fetch_data(data_id)
    result = analyze_data(data)
    save_result(result)
    return result

# 定时任务
@app.task
def daily_report():
    """每日报表生成"""
    generate_report()

docs.title: 告警规则
docs.text:
告警配置示例

alerts:
  - name: high_cpu_usage
    condition: cpu_usage > 80%
    duration: 5m
    severity: warning
    notification:
      - email
      - slack

  - name: api_error_rate
    condition: error_rate > 5%
    duration: 3m
    severity: critical
    notification:
      - email
      - sms
      - pagerduty

docs.title: 1. 插件系统
docs.text:
支持通过插件扩展功能：

class Plugin:
    """插件基类"""

    def __init__(self, config):
        self.config = config

    def on_load(self):
        """插件加载时调用"""
        pass

    def on_request(self, request):
        """请求处理时调用"""
        pass

    def on_response(self, response):
        """响应返回时调用"""
        pass

docs.title: 2. 工作流引擎
docs.text:
可视化的工作流设计和执行：

graph LR
    A[开始] --> B{条件判断}
    B -->|是| C[执行任务A]
    B -->|否| D[执行任务B]
    C --> E[汇总结果]
    D --> E
    E --> F[结束]

docs.title: 3. 数据分析
docs.text:
内置强大的数据分析功能：

  • 统计分析
  • 趋势预测
  • 异常检测
  • 关联分析

docs.title: 缓存策略
docs.text:
from functools import lru_cache
from redis import Redis

redis_client = Redis(host='localhost', port=6379)

# 内存缓存
@lru_cache(maxsize=1000)
def get_user_by_id(user_id):
    return User.query.get(user_id)

# Redis 缓存
def get_product(product_id):
    cache_key = f"product:{product_id}"
    cached = redis_client.get(cache_key)

    if cached:
        return json.loads(cached)

    product = Product.query.get(product_id)
    redis_client.setex(
        cache_key, 
        3600,  # 1小时过期
        json.dumps(product.to_dict())
    )
    return product.to_dict()

docs.title: 产品定位
docs.text: YaYu 产品是一个面向企业的综合性解决方案，旨在帮助企业提升效率、降低成本、优化业务流程。

docs.title: 核心架构
docs.text:
我们的产品采用现代化的微服务架构，确保高可用性和可扩展性：

graph TB
    A[客户端] --> B[API Gateway]
    B --> C[认证服务]
    B --> D[业务服务]
    B --> E[数据服务]
    D --> F[(主数据库)]
    D --> G[(缓存)]
    E --> H[(数据仓库)]
